languages.text: "Знания развращают душу. Как и прочтение лишних букв". {n}Старый жрец мрачно хмурится, глядя на то, как расчувствовался юнец.{/n}
"Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Знания развращают душу. Как и прочтение лишних букв". {n}Старый жрец мрачно хмурится, глядя на то, как расчувствовался юнец.{/n}

"Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

languages.text: “知识会腐蚀灵魂。若是读了不该读的东西，就会招致恶果。”{n}年迈的牧师皱起了眉头，对年轻人热情洋溢的话语不以为然。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “知识会腐蚀灵魂。若是读了不该读的东西，就会招致恶果。”{n}年迈的牧师皱起了眉头，对年轻人热情洋溢的话语不以为然。{/n}

languages.text: 「知識は魂を堕落させます─読むべきでない書を読むことと同じように」{n}若者の情熱的な言葉に、老司祭は眉をひそめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「知識は魂を堕落させます─読むべきでない書を読むことと同じように」{n}若者の情熱的な言葉に、老司祭は眉をひそめた。{/n}

languages.text: «El conocimiento deprava el alma, como también lo hace leer palabras que no están destinadas a leerse». {n}El anciano sacerdote frunce el ceño al oír la pasión en la voz del joven.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El conocimiento deprava el alma, como también lo hace leer palabras que no están destinadas a leerse». {n}El anciano sacerdote frunce el ceño al oír la pasión en la voz del joven.{/n}

languages.text: "Okunmaması gereken harfleri okumak gibi bilgi de ruhu kirletir." {n}Yaşlı rahip, genç olanın tutkulu sözleri üzerine kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Okunmaması gereken harfleri okumak gibi bilgi de ruhu kirletir." {n}Büyük olan rahip, küçük olanın tutkulu sözleri üzerine kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « La connaissance pervertit l'âme, tout comme la lecture de lettres qui ne sont pas destinées à être lues. » {n}Le vieux prêtre fronce les sourcils en entendant la déclaration enflammée du jeune homme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Knowledge depraves the soul, as does reading letters that are not meant to be read." {n}The old priest furrows his brow at the young man's passionate words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La connaissance pervertit l'âme, tout comme la lecture de lettres qui ne sont pas destinées à être lues. » {n}Le vieux prêtre fronce les sourcils en entendant la déclaration enflammée du jeune homme.{/n}

languages.text: "Wissen verdirbt die Seele, genau wie das Lesen von Briefen, die nicht gelesen werden sollen." {n}Der alte Priester runzelt die Stirn angesichts der leidenschaftlichen Wort des jungen Mannes.{/n}
